title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: How to Upgrade or Downgrade Subscription Tier
content:
Users can change their subscription tier at any time:

- Navigate to 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan' > 'Change Tier'
- Basic tier: 4 experiences/month, standard access
- Premium tier: 8 experiences/month, priority booking, exclusive events

Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades apply at next billing cycle.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"To change your tier, go to My Account > Manage Plan > Change Tier. Upgrades are immediate, while downgrades take effect at your next billing date."

title: How to Check Remaining Monthly Quota
content:
Users can view their remaining experiences for the month:

- Open the CultPass app
- Tap on 'My Account' or the profile icon
- View 'Experiences Remaining' counter

Quota resets on the first day of each billing cycle, not calendar month.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can check your remaining experiences in the 'My Account' section of the app. Your quota resets on your billing date, not the first of the month."

title: What to Do If an Experience Is Fully Booked
content:
When an experience shows as fully booked:

- Join the waitlist if available
- Check back regularly as cancellations open spots
- Browse similar experiences in the same category
- Premium members get priority access to waitlists

**Suggested phrasing:**
"If an experience is full, you can join the waitlist. We'll notify you if a spot opens up. You can also explore similar events in the same category."

title: How to Cancel a Reservation
content:
Users can cancel reservations up to 24 hours before the event:

- Go to 'My Reservations' in the app
- Select the reservation to cancel
- Tap 'Cancel Reservation'
- The experience credit is returned to your monthly quota

Cancellations within 24 hours may not receive a quota refund.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel a reservation up to 24 hours before the event to get your experience credit back. Go to My Reservations and tap Cancel."

title: Premium vs Basic Experiences
content:
CultPass offers two types of experiences:

**Basic Experiences:**
- Included in all subscriptions
- Museums, galleries, standard concerts
- Usually higher availability

**Premium Experiences:**
- May require Premium tier or additional fee
- Exclusive events, VIP access, limited attendance
- Marked with a star icon in the app

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Basic experiences are included in all plans. Premium experiences may require a Premium subscription or an additional fee."

title: How to Update Account Information
content:
Users can update their profile in the app:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'
- Update name, email, phone number, or password
- Email changes require verification
- For security, sensitive changes may require re-authentication

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your information in My Account > Profile Settings. Email changes will need to be verified."

title: Payment Methods and Billing Issues
content:
For payment and billing inquiries:

- Accepted: Credit cards, debit cards, PayPal
- Billing occurs on the same day each month
- Failed payments result in a 7-day grace period
- After grace period, account is suspended until payment

For refunds or billing disputes, escalate to human support.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. If a payment fails, you have 7 days to update your payment method before suspension."
tags: payment, billing, credit card, refund, suspension

title: How to Contact Human Support
content:
When AI support cannot resolve an issue:

- Users can request to speak with a human agent
- Available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM local time
- Response time: within 24 hours for email, immediate for chat during business hours
- Provide ticket ID for faster resolution

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I can connect you with a human agent. Our support team is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM. Would you like me to escalate your case?"

title: Troubleshooting App Crashes and Errors
content:
For technical issues with the CultPass app:

1. Ensure app is updated to latest version
2. Clear app cache (Settings > Apps > CultPass > Clear Cache)
3. Restart the device
4. Reinstall the app if issues persist
5. Check internet connection stability

For persistent issues, collect error screenshots and escalate to technical support.

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try updating the app and clearing the cache. If the issue continues, please reinstall the app or contact our technical support team."

title: Blocked Account Resolution
content:
When a user's account is blocked:

- Common reasons: payment issues, policy violations, suspicious activity
- Verify user identity before discussing account status
- For payment blocks: direct to update payment method
- For policy violations: escalate to human support
- Never unblock accounts directly - always escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"I see your account has a restriction. Let me look into this for you. For security reasons, I'll need to verify some information or connect you with our support team."
